name: GehtSiAus
description:
Your customer is running out of space in their current home so they asked you to pack up all their stuff and move it to a new place. Can you manage to pack all their belongings into your truck before the bikers on the blocked bike lane get too angry with you?

The goal of the game is to pack your moving truck with your customers belongings.
You have to place the objects neatly so you won't RUN OUT OF SPACE.
All while your truck is actually blocking the bike line and bikers are getting angry.

So be fast and tidy before your time runs out :)

Also remember the rules of a transporter: never change the deal, no names, and never look in the package.

This Game was created in a solo efford for the Epic Mega Jam 2021

Single Player

Keyboard and Mouse Play

Note: You are giving instructions to your colleagues on how to pack the truck.
Hence you can only give one instruction at a time. (ie. you can not rotate and move athe same time)

Click and drag Middle Mouse Button to Rotate/Orbit the Camera
Scroll the mouse wheel to change the view distance
Click Left Mouse Button on wrapped object to select it
Use the Keyboard Controls or click on the Gizmo Arrows to give your colleagues instructions on how to move the Object

Object Movement/Rotation
W - Move Forward
S - Move Backward
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Ctrl - Move Down
Space - Move up
Rotate left - Q
Rotate right - E
Rotate forward - R
Rotate backward - F
Rotate clockwise - X
Rotate counter-clockwise - Y/Z
